messages.subject: Unschooling movie/dvd
messages.msgSnippet: This is like the PBS pledge drive moment--those outside the U.S. maybe be unfamiliar, which is fine :-) Lee Stranahan s working on a DVD presentation of
messages.messageBody:
This is like the PBS pledge drive moment--those outside the U.S. maybe
be unfamiliar, which is fine :-)

Lee Stranahan's working on a DVD presentation of unschooling. He's
interviewed me three times and there will be more, and some other
people. (Those three youtube bits are from the first of the three
interviews thusfar.)

If you'd like to get some of the raw video as he's working on it and
also assist with the initial funding, here's the way to do that, and
it's funded through Amazon.com. If you make a pledge, it won't be
charged to your account unless the total passes the goal of $250.

http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/968679247/unschooling-the-movie

Thanks,

Sandra
